title: aDimalariNai
sahitya:
aDimalariNai allAl marugati avaniyil ariyEnE


anupallavi

  iDarurum pavamenum kaDal iDaippaDu muzhu
maDaiyanai IshA nI kaiviDa ninaiyAdE unadu tiru


caraNam    anjupala vEDarAtrunju nenjAlippira
Bhanjamidil minjiyadu sancalamE shambhuvE
kanjanezhuttin un koDum shinamoDu varum
venjamadUtarukku anjinEnukku unadu tiru
